headline.print_headline: Fantasy Site DraftKings Lands Canadian Football Partner

docs.snippet: Fantasy sports fans will soon be able to draft Canadian Football League players....

headline.main: Drake's 'Views' Spends 7th Straight Week Atop Billboard Chart
headline.print_headline: Drake's 'Views' Spends 7th Straight Week Atop Billboard Chart

docs.snippet: Canadian R&B singer Drake held onto the top spot of the weekly U.S. Billboard 200 album chart for a seventh consecutive week on Monday, becoming the first male artist in more than a decade to achieve the feat, according to Billboard....
docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian R&B singer Drake held onto the top spot of the weekly U.S. Billboard 200 album chart for a seventh consecutive week on Monday, becoming the first male artist in more than a decade to achieve the feat, according to Billboard.

headline.main: Massachusetts Woman Skydives to Celebrate Her 87th Birthday
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Woman Skydives to Celebrate Her 87th Birthday

docs.snippet: A Massachusetts woman can check something off her bucket list: She celebrated her 87th birthday by skydiving....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts woman can check something off her bucket list: She celebrated her 87th birthday by skydiving.

headline.main: 2 Jailed Over Confederate Flag Fight in South Carolina
headline.print_headline: 2 Jailed Over Confederate Flag Fight in South Carolina

headline.main: Shanghai Emerging Frontrunner for Tesla's China Production: Bloomberg
headline.print_headline: Shanghai Emerging Frontrunner for Tesla's China Production: Bloomberg

headline.main: Guide to World Sports Bodies Judging Russia's Doping Case
headline.print_headline: Guide to World Sports Bodies Judging Russia's Doping Case

headline.main: Supreme Court Backs Police in Utah Drug Search Case
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Backs Police in Utah Drug Search Case

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday widened the ability of prosecutors to use evidence obtained by police during an unlawful stop against a defendant in court in a case involving a Utah man who a narcotics detective found carrying illegal drugs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday widened the ability of prosecutors to use evidence obtained by police during an unlawful stop against a defendant in court in a case involving a Utah man who a narcotics detective found carrying illegal drugs.

headline.main: IBF Will Punish Boxers Who Compete in Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: IBF Will Punish Boxers Who Compete in Rio Olympics

docs.snippet: The International Boxing Federation will punish fighters who compete in the Rio de Janeiro Olympics by removing them from the sanctioning body's rankings or vacating their titles....
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Boxing Federation will punish fighters who compete in the Rio de Janeiro Olympics by removing them from the sanctioning body's rankings or vacating their titles.

headline.main: School Board Member, Delegate Sorry for Islam Sign Complaint
headline.print_headline: School Board Member, Delegate Sorry for Islam Sign Complaint

docs.snippet: A central Pennsylvania school board member and Republican National Convention delegate has apologized for criticizing a church that posted a message on its sign "Wishing a blessed Ramadan to our Muslim neighbors."...
docs.lead_paragraph: A central Pennsylvania school board member and Republican National Convention delegate has apologized for criticizing a church that posted a message on its sign "Wishing a blessed Ramadan to our Muslim neighbors."

headline.main: Johnson Answers Critics in Best Possible Way With Open Win
headline.print_headline: Johnson Answers Critics in Best Possible Way With Open Win

docs.snippet: While soaking up perhaps the greatest pressure he has ever experienced, Dustin Johnson delivered a perfect riposte to criticism of his major credentials with a drama-laden U.S. Open victory on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: While soaking up perhaps the greatest pressure he has ever experienced, Dustin Johnson delivered a perfect riposte to criticism of his major credentials with a drama-laden U.S. Open victory on Sunday.
